---
title: "Week 6 Data Summary"
author: "Noah"
date: "2023-06-03"
categories: [news, code, analysis]
image: "image.jpg"
---



::: {.cell}

```{.r .cell-code}
tweets <- readRDS("ncod_tweets.rds")
```
:::

::: {.cell}

```{.r .cell-code}
library(tidyverse)

hist(tweets$favorite_count)
```

::: {.cell-output-display}
![](index_files/figure-html/unnamed-chunk-2-1.png){width=672}
:::
:::

::: {.cell}

```{.r .cell-code}
ggplot(tweets, aes(x=favorite_count)) + 
  geom_histogram()
```

::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stderr}
```
`stat_bin()` using `bins = 30`. Pick better value with `binwidth`.
```
:::

::: {.cell-output-display}
![](index_files/figure-html/unnamed-chunk-3-1.png){width=672}
:::
:::

::: {.cell}

```{.r .cell-code}
library(dplyr)

filtered_data <- tweets%>%
  filter(favorite_count<25)
ggplot(filtered_data, aes(x=favorite_count)) + 
  geom_histogram()
```

::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stderr}
```
`stat_bin()` using `bins = 30`. Pick better value with `binwidth`.
```
:::

::: {.cell-output-display}
![](index_files/figure-html/unnamed-chunk-4-1.png){width=672}
:::
:::

::: {.cell}

```{.r .cell-code}
favourite_summary <- summarise(tweets,
                           mean_favs = mean(favorite_count),
                           median_favs = median(favorite_count),
                           min_favs = min(favorite_count),
                           max_favs = max(favorite_count))
```
:::


###Log Scale


::: {.cell}

```{.r .cell-code}
ggplot(tweets, aes(x = favorite_count)) +
  geom_histogram(bins = 25) +
  scale_x_continuous(trans = "pseudo_log", 
                     breaks = c(0, 1, 10, 100, 1000, 10000))
```

::: {.cell-output-display}
![](index_files/figure-html/unnamed-chunk-6-1.png){width=672}
:::
:::

::: {.cell}

```{.r .cell-code}
tweet_summary <- tweets %>%
  summarise(mean_favs = mean(favorite_count),
            median_favs = quantile(favorite_count, .5),
            n = n(),
            min_date = min(created_at),
            max_date = max(created_at))

glimpse(tweet_summary)
```

::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stdout}
```
Rows: 1
Columns: 5
$ mean_favs   <dbl> 29.71732
$ median_favs <dbl> 3
$ n           <int> 28626
$ min_date    <dttm> 2021-10-10 00:10:02
$ max_date    <dttm> 2021-10-12 20:12:27
```
:::
:::

tweets$source[25]

::: {.cell}

```{.r .cell-code}
tweet_summary <- tweets %>%
  summarise(mean_favs = mean(favorite_count),
            median_favs = quantile(favorite_count, .5),
            n = n(),
            min_date = min(created_at),
            max_date = max(created_at))

glimpse(tweet_summary)
```

::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stdout}
```
Rows: 1
Columns: 5
$ mean_favs   <dbl> 29.71732
$ median_favs <dbl> 3
$ n           <int> 28626
$ min_date    <dttm> 2021-10-10 00:10:02
$ max_date    <dttm> 2021-10-12 20:12:27
```
:::
:::


###Inline coding


::: {.cell}

```{.r .cell-code}
date_from <- tweet_summary$min_date %>% 
  format("%d %B, %Y")
date_to <- tweet_summary$max_date %>% 
  format("%d %B, %Y")
```
:::


There were 28626 tweets between 10 October, 2021 and 12 October, 2021.


::: {.cell}

```{.r .cell-code}
tweets_per_user <- tweets %>%
  count(screen_name, sort = TRUE)

(tweets_per_user)
```

::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stdout}
```
# A tibble: 25,189 × 2

   <chr>           <int>

 4 dr_stack           32

10 Heyyitsju5tin      19
# … with 25,179 more rows
```
:::
:::

::: {.cell}

```{.r .cell-code}
tweets_grouped <- tweets %>%
  group_by(verified)

verified <- tweets_grouped %>%
  summarise(count = n(),
            mean_favs = mean(favorite_count),
            mean_retweets = mean(retweet_count)) %>%
  ungroup()

verified
```

::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stdout}
```
# A tibble: 2 × 4
  verified count mean_favs mean_retweets
  <lgl>    <int>     <dbl>         <dbl>
1 FALSE    26676      18.4          1.83
2 TRUE      1950     184.          21.5 
```
:::
:::
